About me

Hello! I’m Elizabeth Case. I’m a scientist, writer, and educator. Currently I’m working on my PhD at Columbia University and the Lamont-Dohety Earth Observatory. I’m the co-founder of Cycle for Science. I have been published in Scientific American (see here and here, the State of the Planet, and more.

My cv is available here
